info.name: Tweakers Dark v2 (by Jooch)
info.description:
Overall dark theme for Tweakers.net
Forked from Tweakers Dark by evoltion
info.additionalInfo:
Designed for desktop use, usability = top priority.

V2.1 - Fixed some more borders
V2.5 - Massive update, mainly tables. Forums now work and overall much more consistent look.
V2.7 - Update to latest site design, many small fixes.
V3.0 - Very big update, first alpha version! Almost the entire site is now restyled and bug free.
V3.05 - A few small bug fixes and changes to improve readability.

tweakblogs, energy and internet comparison are not covered yet.
Responsive design not tested much

style.css:
@-moz-document domain("tweakers.net") {
/*TEXT*/

.pageTabs li.active a, .pageTabs li.active a
    {font-weight: bold}

.atLabel span
    {color: #606060!important;}

#layout *, .editionOverview .specs *, .entityHeader .subInfo ,  .entityHeader .breadcrumb > li , .entityHeader .breadcrumb > li a, .galleryInnerTable th, .scrollableList .listItem, .scrollableList .listItem:hover, .menuHeaderPopup .header a.showLink, .menuHeaderPopup .header a.hideLink, h3, .bar.warning
, #activeFilters .filter .value, #storedFilterSet .activeFilters .filter .value, .activeFilters .filter .value, .storedFilters .filter .value
, .filterOption h4
, #campaignMenu .pageTabs > ul li a
, #categoryBar p.more a
, #toc.fixed .reviewToc .tocContent ul li
, .popup span.karma, .popup span.count, div.emperor
, #tweakbase_relations h2
, .responsiveFilter #filter .responsiveToggleBtn
, .responsiveFilter #filter.open .responsiveToggleBtn
    {color: #CCC;}

#filterForm .filterGroup > h3
    {color: #CCC!important;}

.filterOption.collapsed h4
    {color: #999!important;}    
    
.toggleSwitch span.checked
, input#searchProduct.tag.inputsearch
    {color: #444 !important;}    

.arrowUp, .sortOptions .asc, .arrowDown, .sortOptions .desc
, .karmaPopup p span.show
, .messagecontent hr
, .faqcontent hr
, .spoiler
    {color: #000 !important;}    
    
a
    {color: #3199B3;}    

h1, header .subheading, #contentArea .centeredContent h2.chapter
    {color: #DA1E46 !important;}

#toc.fixed .reviewToc h2
    {color: #A01837 !important;}
    
.headlines.highlights.useVisitedState a:visited
, #activeFilters .filter, #storedFilterSet .activeFilters .filter, .activeFilters .filter, .storedFilters .filter
, #simpleItemSearchSelector h3
    {color:#99a !important}
    
#pricewatch li .fancyButton, #poll label:hover span, .commentCount , a.fancyButton, span.fancyButton, .portalBlock #categoryBrowser *
, .pageDistribution b, .fancyButton, .sortable.sortorder li a, [id="overviewCtaButton"] *, .sortable > ul > li > a
    {text-shadow: none !important;}
    
#categoryBar ul a, #jobs li .location a, #community p , #ticker , .latestVideos p.views, a.videoNextPage, #header h1 .subtitle,
.editionOverview table.spec-detail .spec-index-column, #ScoreCardDiv h3, .entityHeader .inventory span, .entityHeader .wishlist span,
#history .date, #header h1 .subtitle a, .rbProductlist .item .fancyButton, #navMenu > li > a, #categoryBrowser li a
, table.listing .lowestPriceBadge
, .ctaButton.checkbox.selected span
, .toggleable .toggleBtn
, .filterPosts ul li.active a
, .pageDistribution a, .pageDistribution .current
,.pageTabs li a:hover
, div.post td.contrast, div.post td.contrast b
    {color: #FFF !important;}

.fpaItem a, input.text, .pageTabs > ul a, .forumList table.listing *, #select_days, #select_days *, .fancyButton.grey, .messagecontent .message-quote-div *, .messagecontent .message-quote-div, .productCompare #filterContainer *, .sortable.select .specName, .sortable.sortorder small, .priceFilter #filter *, .jouwRechten *, .responsiveFilter #filter *, #reacties #reactieContainer > .reactie > .reactieBody.spotlight *, [class="filterOption"] *, [id="tab:forum"] table.listing *, [class="reactie"] .reactieBody.spotlight *, .pageDistribution .next
, .ctaButton
, .filterGroup > h3
, #menu > ul > li.more.dropdown > span
, #toc.fixed .reviewToc .tocContent ul li.active
, .responsiveFilter #filter .responsiveToggleBtn:hover
    {color: #eee;
    text-shadow: none !important;}

.productCards .card .discount
    {color: #014a93 !important;}

table.listing .discount
    {color: #317ac3 !important;
    background-color: #333;
    border-radius: 30px;
    box-shadow: -1px 1px 2px #222;}


/*BACKGROUNDS*/

#imageViewer
, .ctaButton.unselected:hover
, .ctaButton.secondary:hover
    {background: rgb(30,30,30) !important;}

#storedFilterSet
, .relatedSubject
, .bar.info, .bar.notice, .bar.announcement, .bar.tip

.careerEditForm fieldset legend, .profileSkills fieldset legend

textarea
, #contentArea input[type="text"]
, #simpleItemSearchSelector input.inputsearch
, input[type="text"], .formTable input[type="password"], .formTable input[type="email"], .formTable input[type="url"]
, #whereSelect

body, .ScorecardView, .article #ScoreCardDiv .ScoreCard .productInfo, .specs .popularSpecs, .sortable.select .specName, select.text
, #categoryBrowser, table.phphighlight td.phphighlightcode pre, table.phphighlight td.phphighlightcode code
, #imageOverlay, #bottom div.hr, #entity, #heroBlock, #searchbar, .galleryHeadingContainer, .pageTabsContainer, .notificationsContainer
, .darkBlock
, #ScoreCardDiv
, .greyBorderBox
, .CodeMirror
, table.phphighlight td.phphighlightcode > div
    {background: rgb(39, 40, 40) !important;}

.bestTestedContainer .bestTestedProduct .info .intro
, .article .infoBox
, .bar.ok
    {background-color: #40463f;}

#menubottombar,.ScorecardView,.textadContainer,#b_ad, table.forumlisting > tbody > tr > td, table.phphighlight td.phphighlightline
, #bestBuyGuides .highlightedProduct, #bestBuyGuides .allBestBuys li, .fpHighlightedProduct
, div.selectedSkills span.selectedSkill
, #activeFilters .filter, #storedFilterSet .activeFilters .filter, .activeFilters .filter, .storedFilters .filter
, #toc.fixed.bottom
, #userbar li.icon.selected 
, .jobListingContainer .jobItem .topJobLabel
, .ctaButton.checkbox span::before
, #categoryBrowser li
, #categoryBrowser div, #categoryBrowser .sublist
, .toggleSwitch span:first-child, .toggleSwitch.on span:last-child

, .membersonly
, .messagecontent blockquote.twitter-tweet, .messagecontent blockquote.instagram-media
    {background: rgb(49, 50, 50);}
 
#categoryBrowser li.more
    {background-image: url("https://tweakimg.net/g/if/categories/arrows.png");
    background-position: 252px -18px;
    background-repeat: no-repeat;}

#categoryBrowser li:hover
    {background-color: #444;
    box-shadow: 0px 0px 0px 1px rgba(90, 90, 0, 0.03) inset;
    background-image: url("https://tweakimg.net/g/if/categories/arrows.png");
    background-position: 252px -18px;
    background-repeat: no-repeat;}

#categoryBar p.more {
    background: url("https://tweakimg.net/g/hidpi/icons/chevron_white.svg") no-repeat right center/8px 13px;}

table.forumlisting .title span {
    background: url("https://tweakimg.net/g/hidpi/icons/arrow-sprite.png") no-repeat 5px -9px; background-size: 13px 103px;}

#tweakbase_relations.arrow::before {top: -7px;}

#contentArea, .userklipklap > div, .pageTabs li.active, ul.tabbedContent li.active, .pageTabs li.active .more > div
, .pageTabs .more.dropdown > div
, #menu > ul > li.more.dropdown
, .labelCard
, .ScoreCard .ScorecardView
, #myprofilecontainer h2

Hover kadera.fancyButton.grey.clickOut, #poll label:hover, .filterPosts ul {
    background: rgb(49, 50, 50) !important;
    text-shadow: none;}    

.sliderBar, .sliderTick::before, #categoryBrowser .images li:hover
    {background: rgb(40, 41, 41);}

.relatedSubject:hover
, .relationeditor .resultItemSimple:hover, .relationeditor .resultItem:hover
    {background: rgb(55,60,80)}    

.filterOption label.selected
    {background: #526342;}

.filterOption .toggleSwitch.notSelect.on ~ ul label.selected
    {background: #633d44!important;}

img.error, .bar.warning
    {background: #633d42;}

.article hr, .article.bestbuy hr, .messagecontent hr
, .relationeditor .resultItemSimple, .relationeditor .resultItem, .relationeditor .resultFooter
, .searchTable
, #fotoalbum .sidebar
, div.content table.tweakblog
, .content .sidebar
, .CodeMirror-gutters
    {background: rgb(60,60,60)}

TABLE.itemList, TABLE.text-fontsmall.marginTop5, .pollWrapper, .searchAanbod #nearbyAdForm
, .electConsentArea
, div.columnwrapper.normal div.content table.itemList tbody tr td.bar
, #adv

    background-color: rgb(60, 60, 60) !important;}

.vaPortalColumnLeft.portalBlock h2.bar, .vaPortalColumnRight.portalBlock h2.bar, .vaAdvertisement h2.bar
, .galleryBody h3.bar, .galleryTable.karma td, .gallery .bar
, #resultList .resultFooter
, .vaStatistics

, h3.toggleBtn.bar.right

.galleryTable th, .galleryInnerTable th, .poll label:hover, .forumList table.listing, #content table.listing, table.forumlisting .preview .content
, div.message.topicstarter div.poster.avatar div.userheader .labelCard.single.topicstarter

    background-color: rgb(70, 70, 70) !important;}

.messagecontent table.rml td.nocontrast
    {background: rgb(70,70,70)!important;}

.filterGroup > h3    
, .thumb.empty::before
, .keywordSearch
, .nextPrevLinks.large li:hover
, .ctaButton.disabled, .ctaButton[disabled]
    {background: rgb(80,80,80)}

.messagecontent .message-quote-div
, .counter
, .messagecontent .toggle-quote
    {background: rgb(90,90,90)}

.CodeMirror-selected
    {background: rgb(70,90,110)!important;}
   
/*BG None*/
.article table, .autoPagerS, .searchAanbod #nearbyAdForm, #filter, .pageTabsContainer, #entity, #tracker .fakeTop, .nocontrast, .downloadDetails, .relationeditor table, .pageTabs li.link, .filterGroup, .article table td
, .thumb.usericonsmall.empty
, #campaignMenu .pageTabs > ul li
    {background: none !important;}

/*BG Transparent*/
#portalPlayerWrapper, .ScoreCard , .reactieBody.informative
, table.forumlisting .preview .more

/*BG Linear Gradients*/
#top 
    {background: linear-gradient(transparent 44px, black 44px, black 67px, rgba(0,0,0, .5) 67px, rgba(50, 50, 50, .2) 50px, transparent 122px)}

.popup .fadeShowMore.top::before
    {background-image: linear-gradient(rgb(50,50,50), rgba(0,0,0,0));}

.popup .fadeShowMore.bottom::after
    {background-image: linear-gradient(rgba(0,0,0,0), rgb(50,50,50));}

table.forumlisting .preview .content.largePost .post::after
    {background-color: rgba(70,70,70,0); background-image: linear-gradient(rgba(0,0,0,0.0), rgb(70,70,70));min-height: 80px;}
    
.pageTabs li, ul.tabbedContent li
    {background: #353535 linear-gradient(#353535, #292929) repeat scroll 0% 0% !important;}
    
.messagecontent h5
, .userreviewsListing .galleryInnerTable th p
    {background-color: #515151;
    background-image: linear-gradient(to bottom, #515151, #4C4C4C);}    

.forumList table.listing td, #content table.listing td
, div.error, div.message, div.faq, form.insertMessage, form.form1, form.form2, #folders, #myprofilecontainer
, #calendarEvents .itemList li
, .sortable.select > div
, .relatedBlock
, .scoreUnselected, .scoreGray
, #forumheading .info, div.info.find_topics.poster

, #resultList .resultItem

    background-image: linear-gradient(to bottom, #404040, #3C3C3C);}    

fieldset.modbreak {
    background-color: #57293d;

h2.bar.question
    {background-color: #457;
    background-image: linear-gradient(#455575, #457);}

h2.bar.answer
    {background-color: #474;
    background-image: linear-gradient(#457545, #474);}    

div.message.bestAnswer {
    background-color: #784;
    background-image: linear-gradient(#314032, #313832);
    border-color: #405040;}

#bottom div.hr
    {background-color: rgb(120, 120, 120);}

  
/*/BORDERS*/

#top, .darkFpBlock, .pageTabsContainer, table.spec-detail td.spec-column, #entity > div, #ticker, #jobs, .userReviewDescription, .frontpage #community .userReview .userReviewDescription, #pmessages form h3.inverted, .downloadDetails table td, .relationeditor table tr td
, div.message
, rbEntitylist
, #forumheading #tweakbase_relations
, table.forumlisting .preview .content
, div.columnwrapper.normal div.content table.itemList tbody tr:first-child td, div.section.wrap table.text-fontsmall.marginTop5 tbody tr:first-child td
    {border: 0 !important;}

.thumb

.labelCard
    {border-color: #606060;}
    
.ctaButton.secondary
, input#searchProduct.tag.inputsearch
    {border-color: #CCC;}

#userbar li.icon.selected
    {border-color: rgb(40, 40, 40);}

.bar.warning
, fieldset.modbreak
    {border: 1px solid #754853;}

.article .infoBox
, .bar.ok
    {border-color: #455134;}
    
#storedFilterSet
, .bar.info, .bar.announcement, .bar.tip, .bar.notice
    {border-color: #353842;}

.messagecontent table.rml
    {border-color: #555!important;}

.relatedBlock.karmaPopup ol li , .relatedBlock.karmaPopup ol
    {border-color: rgb(49, 50, 50);}

TABLE.itemList, TABLE.text-fontsmall.marginTop5, .sliderBar, .userklipklap
, #storedFilterSet .activeFilters .filter, .activeFilters .filter, .storedFilters .filter

#contentArea, #top, #mainSearch, #entity > div, .entityHeader .thumb, .galleryHeading .thumb, .pageTabs li, .greyTopBorderBlock, .reactieBody.informative, .reactieBody, input.text, select.text, textarea, .keywordSearch, div.info, div.error, div.message, div.faq, form.form1, form.form2, #folders, #myprofilecontainer, .article table, .fancyButton.white, .fancyButton.grey, .pageDistribution .previous, .pageDistribution .next, .pageDistribution .last, .sortable, #reactieForm textarea, #pmadmin_form dl, #pmadmin_form .formsubmit, #pmreply_form dl, #pmreply_form .formsubmit, .searchAanbod #nearbyAdForm, .ScoreCard, .ScorecardView, .nextPrevLinks.large li, .dropdown ul, .productCards .card, #userbar ul, .specs .popularSpecs, .bar, .userklipklap > div, #contentArea input[type="text"], .filterPosts ul li, ul.tabbedContent li
, #activeFilters .filter, #storedFilterSet .activeFilters .filter, .activeFilters .filter, .storedFilters .filter

, .membersonly

    {border-color: rgb(70, 70, 70);}

#adv
    {border-color: rgb(70, 70, 70)!important;}

    
.greyTopBorderBlock, #sponsored li, #jobs .moreInfo  
, .darkBlock .moreInfo   
    {border-top: 2px solid rgb(35, 35, 35);}

.karmaPopup ol
, #jobs li
, .darkBlock ul.itemList li
, div.mainColumn table.itemList tbody tr td, div.columnwrapper.normal div.content table.itemList tbody tr td, div.columnwrapper.normal div.content table.itemList tbody tr th, div.section.wrap table.text-fontsmall.marginTop5 tbody tr td
, div.content table.tweakblog td, table.tweakblog th.paddingLeft

.message .poster .contributors, .message .poster .keywords

    {border-top: 1px solid rgb(55, 55, 55);}
   
table.highlights, #recentlyTested ul, .frontpage #community .communityReviews, .frontpage #community .communityItem:nth-child(1), .frontpage #community .communityItem:nth-child(2), #highlightedProducts .fpaItem, #tweakbase_relations, .messagecontent .message-quote-div, .article table td, .portalFpaItems .fpaItems, table.shop-listing tr:first-child th, table.shop-listing tr:first-child td, .relationbox, .alternative_products .rbProductlist .item, .ScorecardView .priceData, .articleColumn #community ul li:first-child, #community ul li:first-child + li, #menu .dropdown li.divider, .scrollableList .listItem + .listItem, .menuHeaderPopup .footer, table.forumlisting > tbody > tr > td, .adDetails.main tr:first-child th, .adDetails.main tr:first-child td, .sidebarLocation, .specs .improveSpecsContainer, .userklipklap ul + ul, #articleMeta .meta
, .secondColumn.frontpage #videos .ankeilers
, table.pwListTable td
, .relatedContentContainer .relatedContentItems .itemContainer
, .articleColumn .authorInfo .bioShort
, .mainSearchSuggest ul + h4
, .jobListingContainer .jobItem
, .jobListingContainer .jobItem .topJobLabel
, .relevancyColumn .relatedContentContainer .relatedContentItems
, #toc.fixed .reviewToc .tocContent
, .adDetails .first
, .downloadUpdateHistory
, .articleColumn.userreview .authorContainer
, .relatedBlock li
, #myprofile div.userhandy
, table.form tr.section > td
, .messagecontent h5
, .galleryTable th, .galleryInnerTable th
, div.groupedReviewScoresBlock
, .jobDetailContainer hr
, form p.submit
, #resultList .resultItem
, #resultList .resultFooter
, .article.bestbuy .segmentDescription
, #notificationalertform table tr td, #notificationalertform table tr th
, .shopScore td, .shopScore .noScore
, #my-react table.listing.single
, .pricePopup table td
, table.highlights .title a.showMoreItems
, #categoryBrowser .sublist
, .bestBuyColumn .bestBuyItem, .bestBuyColumn p
, .responsiveSocialButtons
    {border-top: 1px solid rgb(60, 60, 60);}

table.formTable.pwListTable.profileLabels tbody tr td
    {border-top: 1px solid rgb(60, 60, 60)!important;}

.userReview dl
, .relationeditor .resultItemSimple, .relationeditor .resultItem, .relationeditor .resultFooter
, .widebanner > .atLabel, .rectangle > .atLabel, #b_ac > .atLabel
    {border-top: 1px solid rgb(70, 70, 70);}

#reacties #reactieContainer {border-left: 3px dotted rgb(35, 35, 35);}

.messagecontent .message-quote-div, table.listing td.ind, .article #ScoreCardDiv .ScoreCard .productInfo
, .jobListingContainer .jobItem .topJobLabel
, .overviewFilter .filterOption
, #mynotepad div.padding
, .messagecontent .toggle-quote
, .galleryTable th:first-child, .galleryInnerTable th:first-child, .galleryInnerTable th.first
, .productCards .card:first-child, .productCards .card:nth-child(3)
    {border-left: 1px solid rgb(60, 60, 60);}

.CodeMirror-cursor
    {border-left: 1px solid #CCC!important;}

#menu > ul > li.more.dropdown
, .relationeditor.userreviewRelated .resultItem, .relationeditor.userreviewRelated .resultFooter, .relationeditor.userreviewRelated .noresult
    {border-left: 1px solid rgb(70, 70, 70);}

#categoryBrowser .images li
, .CodeMirror-gutters
    {border-right: 1px solid rgb(55, 55, 55);}

.messagecontent .message-quote-div, .reviewPortalFpaItems .portalFpaItems .fpaItems, table.listing td.last, .fpaItems .fpaItem, #search .options
, .sortable.select .specName
, .messagecontent .toggle-quote
, .galleryTable th:last-child, .galleryInnerTable th:last-child, .galleryInnerTable th.last
, .entityHeader.edition .shield + .rating
    {border-right: 1px solid rgb(60, 60, 60);}

.relationeditor.userreviewRelated .resultItem, .relationeditor.userreviewRelated .resultFooter, .relationeditor.userreviewRelated .noresult
, .forumList .timeshort
    {border-right: 1px solid rgb(70, 70, 70);}


.fpaItemsWrapper, .frontpage #community .communityReviews > div, ul.tabbedContent
, .greyBottomBorderBlock
, .popularproducts, .popularreviews, .editorialguides, .popularsearches, .relatedbrands 
    {border-bottom: 2px solid rgb(35, 35, 35);}

#categoryBrowser .images li
    {border-bottom: 1px solid rgb(55, 55, 55);}

table.highlights td, #bestBuyGuides li, #recentlyTested li, .frontpage #community .communityReviews, .frontpage #community .communityTopics, .frontpage #community .communityBlogs, .frontpage #community .communityItem, #tweakbase_relations, .messagecontent .message-quote-div, .portalFpaItems .fpaItems, table.listing th, table.shop-listing th, table.listing td, table.shop-listing td, .rbProductlist .item, .rbEntitylistm, .articleColumn #community li, .menuHeaderPopup .header, .adDetails.main th, .adDetails.main td, .adverteerder dt, .adverteerder dd, .adDetails dt, .adDetails dd, .rbEntitylist, .sidebarLocation, .productSpecifications td, .specs .popularSpecs th, #fpPromo .item, #forum_tabs, #contentArea .centeredContent #articleMeta .meta
, .ankeilers .ankeiler
, #activeFilters
, .relatedContentContainer .relatedContentItems .itemContainer    
, .articleColumn .authorInfo .bioShort

, .selectedProductsPopup .header, .selectedProductsPopup .noProducts
, .menuHeaderPopup .quickSetting
, .newsPortal .newsContentBlock
, .relevancyColumn .relatedContentContainer .relatedContentItems .itemContainer
, #toc.fixed .reviewToc .tocContent
, .galleryWrapper .articleColumn .memberList
, #campaignMenu
, #tweakbase_relations .rbProductlist .item
, .messagecontent h5
, div.inventory
, .articleColumn.userreview .editorialReviewLink, .articleColumn.userreview .hwiArticleSection, div.groupedReviewScoresBlock, .articleColumn.userreview .hwiArticleSection
, #notificationalertform table tr:last-child td
, .shopScore table, .shopScore .noScore
, form#message_form table.form
, table.cssSnippets
, .productFilter #listing table.listing thead th
    {border-bottom: 1px solid rgb(60, 60, 60);}

.galleryInnerTable thead td
    {border-bottom: 1px solid rgb(60, 60, 60)!important;}

.galleryInnerTable td, .bestBuyItem 
, .userReview dl, .karmaPopup ol li
, .secondColumn.frontpage #b_re
, .messagecontent blockquote.twitter-tweet p, .messagecontent blockquote.instagram-media p
    {border-bottom: 1px solid rgb(70, 70, 70);}

#myprofilecontainer h2
, #tweakbase_relations h2
    {border-bottom: 1px solid rgb(80, 80, 80);}
  
ul.tabbedContent li, ul.tabbedContent li.active
    {border-bottom: none;}


.messagecontent h6
    {background-color: #444;
    border-bottom: 1px dashed #606060;
    border-top: 1px dashed #606060;}


/*/Shadows*/    
#forumheading .info, div.info.find_topics.poster
, #content div.info
    {box-shadow: inset 0 0 0 1px rgba(60,60,60,0.33);}

.relatedBlock
, #tweakbase_relations
    {box-shadow: 0px 0px 0px 1px rgba(50, 50, 50, 0.1) inset;}

.CodeMirror-focused {
	border-color: #345!important;;
	box-shadow: inset 0 1px 1px rgba(0,0,0,.075), 0 0 8px rgba(49, 70, 90, .6);}

.darkFpBlock, #jobs, .userReviewDescription, .frontpage #community .userReview .userReviewDescription, div.error, div.message, div.faq, form.form1, form.form2, #folders, #myprofilecontainer, .fancyButton.white, .fancyButton.grey, .userklipklap, .relationeditor table tr td
    {background: linear-gradient(rgb(62, 63, 63), rgb(56, 57, 57)) repeat scroll 0% 0% rgb(56, 57, 57);
    box-shadow: 0px 0px 0px 1px rgba(74, 75, 75, 0.33) inset;}

#community .communityReviews .userReview .reviewContent .userReviewDescription
    {background-color: #555;
    background-image: linear-gradient(to bottom, #555, #444);
    border: 1px solid #D9D9D9;
    border-radius: 2px;
    box-shadow: 0px 0px 0px 1px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.05) inset;
}

table.forumlisting .preview .content
    {border-color: rgb(55, 55, 55);
    box-shadow: 0 0 0 1px rgba(55,55,55,0.33) inset;}

    
/*/*v2.1*/

#search input.text, #search .fancySelect
, .suggestContainer
, #storedFilterSet .activeFilters .filter, .activeFilters .filter, .storedFilters .filter
    {background-color: #222;
    color: #DDD;}

.jobListingContainer .jobItem .jobInfo .tags .tag.location, .jobListingContainer .jobItem .jobInfo .tags .tag.clock, .jobListingContainer .jobItem .jobInfo .tags .tag.graduation
    {color: #000 !important;}    
    
.popup
    {background-color: #555;
    border: 1px solid #333;
    box-shadow: 8px 5px 5px -3px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1), 5px 8px 5px -3px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);}

#categoryBrowser .images li:hover
    {box-shadow: 0px 0px 25px #444 inset, 0px 0px 0px 1px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) inset;}   

#filter
    {background: #444 none repeat scroll 0% 0% !important;
    border: 1px solid #555 !important;}

.filterOption
    {background: #444 none repeat scroll 0% 0% !important;
    border-top: 1px solid #555;}
    
.reactieBody.spotlight
    {background: #333A35 none repeat scroll 0% 0%;
    border-color: #3E5F4E;}
    
.productSpecifications tbody tr:hover, .productSpecifications tbody tr.diff:hover
    {background: #384350 none repeat scroll 0% 0%;}    
    
    
table.listing th
    {line-height: 20px;}
    
table.listing td, .galleryHeadingContainer > div
    {border-top: none;}
        
.fpaImageContainer::before
    {background: #111 none repeat scroll 0% 0%;
    opacity: 0.7;}
    
.menuHeaderPopup .notification.unread
    {background: rgb(50, 55, 66);}


/*/*FILTERS*/
#community .communityReviews .userReview .reviewContent .userReviewDescription p .arrow
, .sortable.select > div::before
, #userbar li.compare.selected a, #userbar li.messages.selected a, #userbar li.notifications.selected a, #userbar li.display.selected a
, .messagecontent p.edit
    {filter: invert(67%);}

.bestTestedProduct .info .arrow
, #collapseButtons span.toggleThread, #collapseButtons span.toggleReaction
    {filter: invert(78%);}

.priceGraph img, #categoryBar li a::before 
, #tweakbase_relations.arrow::before
, .rmlToolbar span
    {filter: invert(80%);}

.sortOptions .desc, .filterOption h4.toggleCollapse::before
, .jobListingContainer .jobItem .jobInfo .tags .tag.location, .jobListingContainer .jobItem .jobInfo .tags .tag.clock, .jobListingContainer .jobItem .jobInfo .tags .tag.graduation
, html.js .toggleable .toggleBtn::after, html.js .toggleable .toggleBtn.left::before
, .arrowUp, .sortOptions .asc
, #mainSearch.keywordSearch input.submit
, .keywordSearch input.submit
, .karmaPopup p span.show
, div.columnwrapper.normal div.content table.itemList tbody tr td span.arrowDown
, input#searchProduct.tag.inputsearch
, #tweakbase_relations h2::before
    {filter: invert(85%);}

.commentCount
, #menu > ul > li.more.dropdown > span::after
, .pageTabs .more > div a::after
, table.forumlisting .preview .more::before
    {filter: invert(100%);}

li#tab_select_more.active > div a::after
    {filter: invert(0%);}

.scoreStars.score00
    {filter: brightness(50%)}

li#tab_select_more.active div.more.dropdown ul li.active a, li#tab_select_more.active div.more.dropdown ul li a
    {filter: brightness(100%)}

.pageTabs li.active a, .pageTabs li.active a
    {filter: brightness(120%)}

.infoIcon
    {filter: brightness(140%)}

/*/*HACKS*/

img.rml.resized {border: 2px dashed #922;}
div.resizewarning div {display:none;}

input[type="checkbox"]
    {
    -webkit-appearance: none;
    -moz-appearance: none;
    appearance: none;

    background-color: #333;
    border: 1px solid #444;
    border-radius: 1px;
    -webkit-box-shadow: inset 0 0 0 1px #222;
    box-shadow: inset 0 0 0 1px #292929;
    cursor: pointer;
    height: 14px;
    width: 14px;
    position: relative;
    vertical-align: top;
    outline: none;
    }

input[type="checkbox"]:checked {
    background-color: #9fbf22;
    border: 1px solid #43510f;
    -webkit-box-shadow: inset 0 0 0 1px #333e0b;
    box-shadow: inset 0 0 0 1px #333e0b;
    }

.videoPortal .videoGallery .videoList
    {scrollbar-color: #555 #404040;
    scrollbar-width: thin;}

#search .keywordSearch
    {height: 27px;}    

#contentArea
    {border: 1px solid rgb(60,60,60);
    border-radius: 1px;
    padding-left: 39px;
    padding-right: 39px;}      

#layout
    {padding-bottom: 50px !important;}

#listingContainer
    {min-height: 100%;}

a:hover, a.highlightlink, a[rb-highlight]
    {box-shadow: none !important;}

#bottom, .relatedItProContent, .relatedItProContent #jobs, .relatedItProContent #training, .jouwRechten, .filterBlock
    {border: 0px !important;
    padding: 0px !important;
    height: 0px !important;
    overflow: hidden !important;}

/*Sidebar*/

.fpaItem .fpaMeta
    {background:rgba(0,0,0,0.0) !important;
    text-shadow: none !important;
    width: 100px;    }    

.fpaItem .fpaMeta a
    {font-weight: 700;
    color: rgba(50,50,50,0.77) !important;}    
    
.dropdown ul,.dropdown li a,.dropdown ul li,.sortable li,.sortable.specification .specName,.sortable .specName,div.sortable:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(1) > span:nth-child(1), .popup
    {background:rgba(50,50,50,0.9) !important;
    text-shadow: none !important;
    color: darkgrey !important;}
    
    #categoryBrowser .large li
        {background-color:rgba(50,50,50,0.9);
        font-size: 14px;
        color: white;
        text-shadow: 0px 0px 1px black;}

#tracker .fakeTop
    {border-bottom: 1px solid transparent;}

[class="fpaImageContainer"]:not(:hover)
    {opacity: .7;}
}

@-moz-document domain("pcnltelecom.tdsapi.com") {
.pc *
    {color: #CCC;}

.pc .pc-option-link__open::before, .pc .pc-option-link__close::before, .pc .pc-option-link__reset::before
    {color: #CCC!important;}

.pc-fc .pc-result__similar-shops-link, .pc a {
     color: #418ac3;}

.pc-option-link__open::before, .pc .pc-option-link__close::before, .pc .pc-option-link__reset::before
    {background-color: #373737!important;}

.pc .pc-option-link
    {background-color: #252525;}

.slider-track {
    background-image: linear-gradient(to bottom, rgb(49,50,50) 0%, rgb(70,70,70) 100%);}    

.pc .pc-option-link
, .pc .pc-option-link__body
    {border: 1px solid rgb(70,70,70);}

.pc hr
    {border-bottom: 1px rgb(70,70,70) solid!important;}

.pc-fc .pc-result
    {border-bottom: 1px rgb(70,70,70) dashed;}
  
.slider-handle {
    border-left: 1px solid rgb(49,50,50);
    border-top: 1px solid rgb(49,50,50);
    border-right: 1px solid rgb(49,50,50);}

.pc-option-link__open::before, .pc .pc-option-link__close::before, .pc .pc-option-link__reset::before
    {border-left: 1px rgb(70,70,70) solid!important;}
    
.pc .pc-compare-subscription__unit
    {border-right: 1px rgb(70,70,70) solid;}
    
html, .pc, .pc .pc-option-link__body, .pc .pc-compare-options, .pc-fc .pc-compare-subscription, .pc-fc .pc-compare-advanced-options
    {background: rgb(49, 50, 50);}

.pc-fc .pc-subject img
    {background: #fff;}
}
